object.name: apple
object.look: a red fruit the size of a closed fist.
object.touch: hard but not so, and smooth.

object.name: poo
object.look: stinky, brown and with some yellow bits of corn.
object.use: you are sick, you know that?

object.name: rose
object.use: you wear it to adorn your clothes.

object.name: sparrow
object.look: small, grey-brown bird with thick beak.

object.name: sword
object.look: anglo-saxon iron seax 28.4 inches long, single-edged and a long tapering point.
object.touch: the cold touch of aged iron chills your spine.
object.use: you swing the sword in the air with the illusion of knowing what you're doing.
